officer.translation[0].definitions[0].de: someone who is in a position of authority in the army, navy etc
officer.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: a commanding officer of the SAS
officer.translation[0].definitions[1].de: someone who is in a position in an organization or the government
officer.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The document must be certified by the proper officer of the state.
officer.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a title for a policeman or policewoman
officer.translation[2].definitions[0].de: someone who has an important position in an organization. ‘Officer’ is often used in job titles
